title: Add bell icon next to each Circle member name

requirements.summary: Display a bell icon adjacent to each listed circle memberâ€™s display name in the Circle Members tab (excluding the current user as already filtered).
acceptanceCriteria: In the Circle page (Members tab), each listed member row shows a bell icon visually adjacent to the member name.
The bell icon is not shown for the current user if they are excluded from the list (current behavior).
The member name, optional age, pulse badge, and remove-member control continue to render and function as before (no regressions).

file_operations.description: Import a bell icon (e.g., from lucide-react) and render it next to the member display name within the existing name/age row, ensuring it appears for every entry in `otherMembers` while preserving existing layout, age display, pulse badge, and remove-member dialog behavior.
